item.title: 消息人士：日本提前召开紧急日元会议，以最大限度地扩大市场影响
item.description: 一位知情人士告诉路透社，日本货币当局在最后一刻决定将原定于周四召开的有关日元疲软问题的紧急会议提前到周三，以最大限度地抑制日元暴跌。【原文：Japanese monetary authorities made a last-minute decision to bring forward to Wednesday an emergency meeting on the weak yen that was originally scheduled for Thursday, to maximise the impact of arresting sharp yen falls, a source with knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 越南第一季度经济增长 5.66%，出口蓬勃发展
item.description: 周五公布的政府数据显示，尽管红海局势动荡导致航运成本上升，但由于出口蓬勃发展，越南第一季度国内生产总值同比增长 5.66%。【原文：Vietnam's gross domestic product in the first quarter grew 5.66% from a year earlier as exports boomed, government data released on Friday showed, despite higher shipping costs due to turmoil in the Red Sea.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州总检察长对波音公司零部件供应商展开调查
item.description: 德克萨斯州总检察长肯-帕克斯顿（Ken Paxton）的办公室周四表示，他已对波音公司的一家零部件供应商--精神航空系统控股公司（Spirit AeroSystems Holdings Inc）展开调查，因为他认为这些零部件中的某些部件经常出现问题。【原文：Texas attorney general Ken Paxton has opened an investigation into a supplier of parts for Boeing , Spirit AeroSystems Holdings Inc after what he said were recurring issues with certain of those parts, his office said on Thursday.】

item.title: 马斯克的 xAI 将推出改进版聊天机器人
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能初创公司xAI周四表示，将推出名为Grok-1.5的改进版聊天机器人Grok，该机器人将在未来几天内向社交媒体平台X上的早期测试者和现有Grok用户开放。【原文：Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI said on Thursday it will launch an improved version of its chatbot Grok called Grok-1.5, which will be available to early testers and existing Grok users on social media platform X in the coming days.】

item.title: 巴西交易所运营商 B3 将于四月推出比特币期货
item.description: 巴西交易所运营商 B3 周四表示，已获得巴西证券监管机构的绿灯，可以提供比特币期货，交易将于 4 月 17 日开始。【原文：Brazilian exchange operator B3 said on Thursday it received a green light from the country's securities regulator to offer bitcoin futures, with trading to start on April 17.】

item.title: 东京通胀放缓、产出下滑为日本央行加息前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 日本首都的核心通胀率在 3 月份放缓，工厂产出在上个月意外下滑，这加剧了日本央行在退出激进货币刺激政策后多久能再次加息的不确定性。【原文：Core inflation in Japan's capital slowed in March and factory output unexpectedly slid in the previous month, heightening uncertainty on how soon the Bank of Japan can raise interest rates again after exiting its radical monetary stimulus.】

item.title: 阿拉斯加航空集团称 737 Max 9 停飞可能影响长期利润增长
item.description: 阿拉斯加航空集团周四表示，波音 737 Max 9 机队停飞造成的运力损失可能导致其长期利润增长低于 4% 至 8% 的目标范围。【原文：Alaska Air Group said on Thursday the lost capacity from the Boeing 737 Max 9 fleet grounding may cause its long-term profit growth to be below its target range of 4% to 8%.】

item.title: Rite Aid 继续推进重组，出售工作仍在继续
item.description: 美国最大的连锁药店之一 Rite Aid 周四获得美国法官的许可，开始就破产重组计划进行投票表决，该计划将把公司的大部分股权移交给债券持有人，同时仍保留出售的可能性。【原文：Rite Aid, one of the largest U.S. pharmacy chains, received permission from a U.S. judge on Thursday to begin voting on a bankruptcy restructuring plan that would turn over most of the company's equity to its bondholders, while still leaving open the possibility of a sale.】

item.title: 早间竞价：第一季度落下帷幕，日元警惕假日风平浪静
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 高盛和摩根士丹利胜诉，Archegos 倒闭诉讼被驳回
item.description: 一名美国法官周四驳回了七名投资者的诉讼，这些投资者指控高盛集团和摩根士丹利的不当行为导致比尔-黄（Bill Hwang）旗下价值 360 亿美元的 Archegos Capital Management 公司在 2021 年 3 月迅速倒闭。【原文：A U.S. judge on Thursday dismissed seven lawsuits by investors who accused Goldman Sachs Group Inc and Morgan Stanley of misconduct that fueled the rapid March 2021 collapse of Bill Hwang's $36 billion firm Archegos Capital Management.】

item.title: 特斯拉似乎不太可能撤销美国指控其对黑人工人有偏见的诉讼
item.description: 周四，加利福尼亚州的一名联邦法官似乎准备驳回特斯拉的请求，即驳回美国一家机构指控这家电动汽车制造商容忍其加利福尼亚州弗里蒙特装配厂的黑人工人受到猖獗骚扰的诉讼。【原文：A federal judge in California on Thursday appeared poised to reject Tesla's bid to toss out a U.S. agency's lawsuit accusing the electric carmaker of tolerating rampant harassment of Black workers at its Fremont, California assembly plant.】

item.title: 美国可能很快公布禁止接收技术的中国芯片工厂名单
item.description: 三位熟知内情的人士说，拜登政府正在起草一份禁止接收关键工具的中国先进芯片制造工厂名单，以方便企业阻止技术流入中国。【原文：The Biden administration is drawing up a list of advanced Chinese chipmaking factories barred from receiving key tools, three people familiar with matter said, to make it easier for companies to stem technology flows into China.】

item.title: 汽车计算机芯片制造商恩智浦推出新平台
item.description: 最大的汽车计算机芯片制造商恩智浦半导体公司（NXP Semiconductors NV）周四表示，该公司已推出一个新平台，将为客户简化和加快软件开发。【原文：NXP Semiconductors NV, the biggest maker of computer chips for cars, on Thursday said it had introduced a new platform that will simplify and speed up software development for its customers.】

item.title: 美国和墨西哥合作发展半导体供应链
item.description: 美国国务院周四表示，美国将与墨西哥合作探索半导体供应链机会，拜登政府正努力减少在半导体技术方面对中国大陆和台湾的依赖。【原文：The United States will partner with Mexico to explore semiconductor supply chain opportunities, the State Department said on Thursday, as the Biden administration pushes to reduce reliance on China and Taiwan for the technology.】

item.title: Blackwells 在特拉华州就披露与 ValueAct 的关系起诉迪士尼
item.description: 布莱克韦尔斯资本公司（Blackwells Capital）在特拉华州法院起诉华特迪士尼，要求其提供在与对冲基金 ValueAct Capital 的交易中可能存在违规披露的信息，从而在一场激烈的董事会争斗中加大对迪士尼的压力。【原文：Blackwells Capital is ratcheting up the pressure on Walt Disney in a bruising boardroom battle by suing the entertainment giant in Delaware court for information that may point to possible disclosure violations in dealings with hedge fund ValueAct Capital.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：苹果新款 iPad Pro 可能于 5 月发布，并加强海外生产
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道，苹果公司的海外供应商已经增加了新款 iPad 的产量，并计划于 5 月初推出。【原文：Apple's overseas suppliers have increased production of the company's new iPad models and plans to launch them in early May, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 消息人士称，厨房海绵制造商 Scrub Daddy 探讨出售事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在美国电视节目 "鲨鱼坦克"（Shark Tank）中获得投资后大受欢迎的厨房海绵制造商 Scrub Daddy 正在探索包括出售公司在内的各种选择。【原文：Scrub Daddy, the kitchen sponge maker that gained popularity after securing an investment on U.S. TV show "Shark Tank," is exploring options that include a sale of the company, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 纽约市退休系统支持迪士尼与特里安、布莱克韦尔斯的董事会之争
item.description: 纽约市退休系统计划投票选举华特迪士尼的所有董事，这是与两家对冲基金的一场激烈的董事会争夺战。【原文：The New York City Retirement System plans to vote for all Walt Disney directors in a bruising boardroom battle with two hedge funds who are each pushing for board seats for themselves.】

item.title: 班克曼-弗里德的一些受害者希望得到更严厉的判决，他们对此感到沮丧
item.description: 周四，加密货币交易所前亿万富翁老板山姆-班克曼-弗里德（Sam Bankman-Fried）因窃取客户 80 亿美元被判处 25 年监禁，一些前 FTX 客户对此表示愤怒和失望。【原文：Some former FTX customers expressed anger and disappointment on Thursday after Sam Bankman-Fried, the crypto exchange's former billionaire boss, was sentenced to 25 years in prison for stealing $8 billion from customers.】

item.title: 独家报道：菲利普-莫里斯公司即将在得克萨斯州推出旗舰加热烟草设备
item.description: LinkedIn 上的招聘广告显示，菲利普莫里斯国际公司正准备在得克萨斯州奥斯汀推出其旗舰产品加热烟草设备 IQOS，这表明奥斯汀将成为其进军美国的第一个试验场。【原文：Philip Morris International is preparing to launch its flagship heated tobacco device IQOS in Austin, Texas, indicating it will be the first testing ground for its U.S. entry, job adverts on LinkedIn show.】

item.title: 独家报道在出现亏损和管理层出走后，Nutrien 考虑对拉美市场进行撤资
item.description: 全球最大的钾肥生产商 Nutrien Ltd.据直接知情人士透露，全球最大的钾肥生产商 Nutrien Ltd.正在酝酿剥离南美业务，更换管理层，并停止在巴西的收购狂潮。【原文：Nutrien Ltd. , the world's largest producer of potash fertilizer, is mulling divestments in South America, replacing management and halting an acquisition spree in Brazil after steep losses in the region, according to sources with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 白宫布雷纳德称企业利润仍在增长
item.description: 白宫国家经济顾问莱尔-布雷纳德（Lael Brainard）周四表示，企业利润仍然很高，此前美国消费者情绪在3月份意外升至近三年来的最高点，人们希望通胀将继续走软。【原文：White House National Economic Adviser Lael Brainard said on Thursday corporate profits remain elevated, after U.S. consumer sentiment rose unexpectedly in March to the highest in nearly three years on hopes inflation will keep softening.】

item.title: 乔氏集团因巧克力中含有 "重金属 "而提起的诉讼基本被驳回
item.description: 美国一名法官驳回了指控乔氏超市（Trader Joe's）误导和危害消费者的大部分诉讼，因为乔氏超市没有披露其黑巧克力棒含有有害的铅和镉等 "重金属"。【原文：A U.S. judge dismissed most of a lawsuit accusing Trader Joe's of misleading and endangering consumers by failing to disclose that its dark chocolate bars contained harmful levels of "heavy metals" such as lead and cadmium.】

item.title: 希腊 DEPA 就俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司交易中的价格问题申请仲裁
item.description: 希腊天然气供应商 DEPA 商业公司首席执行官康斯坦丁诺斯-西法拉斯（Constantinos Xifaras）周四表示，该公司已申请仲裁，要求修改与俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom）的天然气供应合同价格。【原文：Greek gas supplier DEPA Commercial has filed for arbitration to seek a price revision on its gas supply contract with Gazprom , DEPA CEO Constantinos Xifaras said on Thursday.】

item.title: 花旗称 42% 的能源客户缺乏气候转型计划
item.description: 这家美国第四大银行在周四发布的一份气候报告中称，花旗银行贷款给的能源公司中，几乎有一半没有减少温室气体排放的计划。【原文：Almost half of the energy companies Citi lends to are lacking plans to cut greenhouse gas emissions, the fourth-largest U.S. bank said in a climate report released on Thursday.】

item.title: 世贸组织：中国就美国对电动汽车和可再生能源的税收减免发起争端
item.description: 世界贸易组织（WTO）周四表示，中国已就根据《通货膨胀削减法》提供税收减免以促进电动汽车和可再生能源生产的问题与美国展开争端磋商。【原文：China has initiated dispute consultations with the United States regarding tax credits under the Inflation Reduction Act to promote the production of electric vehicles and renewable energy, the World Trade Organization said on Thursday.】

item.title: 瑞士联合银行施莱格尔认为有必要分析瑞银的资本要求
item.description: 瑞士国家银行副主席周四在接受瑞士《金融与经济》报采访时呼吁对瑞银的资本要求进行深入审查。【原文：The Swiss National Bank's vice chairman called for an in-depth review of UBS's capital requirements in an interview with Swiss newspaper Finanz und Wirtschaft on Thursday.】

item.title: 波音新任首席执行官称波音面临 "关键时刻
item.description: 波音公司陷入困境的商用飞机部门新任负责人表示，这家美国飞机制造商面临着一个 "关键时刻"，因为它要努力提高质量，并解决监管机构和航空公司客户在今年1月一架737 MAX 9喷气机面板脱落后的重大担忧。【原文：The new head of Boeing's troubled commercial airplane unit said the U.S. planemaker faces a "pivotal moment" as it works to boost quality and address significant concerns from regulators and airline customers after a panel flew off a 737 MAX 9 jet in January.】

item.title: 统计局称 2023 年乌克兰经济增长 5.3
item.description: 乌克兰统计局周四表示，乌克兰经济在俄罗斯全面入侵的第一年萎缩近三分之一后，2023 年将增长 5.3%。【原文：Ukraine's economy grew by 5.3% in 2023 after contracting by almost a third in the first year of Russia's full-scale invasion, the statistics service said on Thursday.】

item.title: EIA 称巴尔的摩港口关闭可能影响美国煤炭出口量
item.description: 美国能源信息署（EIA）周四表示，美国第二大煤炭出口枢纽巴尔的摩港停止航运将减缓美国煤炭出口的增长速度，并减少船用燃料的使用。【原文：Halted shipping traffic from the Port of Baltimore, the second-largest U.S. hub for coal exports, will slow the growth in U.S. coal exports and reduce bunker fuel use, the Energy Information Administration (EIA) said on Thursday.】
